actions.committee: House Committee on Foreign Affairs (Subsequently: International Relations)
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs (Subsequently: International Relations).

official_title: Concurrent resolution expressing the sense of Congress that necessary steps be taken by the U.S. Government to determine the status of missing servicemen and civilians in Southeast Asia.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of Congress that the President and Secretary of State take the necessary steps to determine including renegotiation if deemed necessary, the status of missing servicemen and civilians in Southeast Asia.

titles.title: Concurrent resolution expressing the sense of Congress that necessary steps be taken by the U.S. Government to determine the status of missing servicemen and civilians in Southeast Asia.
